text.__SUMMARY__:
Hibbertia ancistrophylla is a shrub in the Dilleniaceae family that is native to Western Australia.The shrub can grow to a height of 0.3 m (1 ft 0 in).
The species has a scattered distribution through the eastern Wheatbelt and western parts of the Goldfields-Esperance regions of Western Australia where it is found in sandy soils.
